@@ -30,7 +30,12 @@ ra_assists = { path = "../ra_assists" }
 
 [dev-dependencies]
 insta = "0.7.0"
-proptest = "0.9.0"
+
+[dev-dependencies.proptest]
+version = "0.9.0"
+# Disable `fork` feature to allow compiling on webassembly
+default-features = false
+features = ["std", "bit-set", "break-dead-code"]
 
 [features]
 jemalloc = [ "jemallocator", "jemalloc-ctl" ]

@@ -17,5 +17,10 @@ ra_fmt = { path = "../ra_fmt" }
 
 [dev-dependencies]
 test_utils = { path = "../test_utils" }
-proptest = "0.9.0"
 insta = "0.7.0"
+
+[dev-dependencies.proptest]
+version = "0.9.0"
+# Disable `fork` feature to allow compiling on webassembly
+default-features = false
+features = ["std", "bit-set", "break-dead-code"]

@@ -7,7 +7,12 @@ publish = false
 
 [dependencies]
 text_unit = "0.1.6"
-proptest = "0.9.0"
+
+[dependencies.proptest]
+version = "0.9.0"
+# Disable `fork` feature to allow compiling on webassembly
+default-features = false
+features = ["std", "bit-set", "break-dead-code"]
 
 [dev-dependencies]
 test_utils = { path = "../test_utils" }
